name: Data, AI & Research
description: The cutting edge of innovation, where data drives decisions and artificial intelligence shapes the future.

subRoles.name: Data Scientist
subRoles.shortDescription: Extracts insights and patterns from complex datasets to drive business decisions.
subRoles.longDescription: Data scientists analyze large datasets to uncover hidden patterns, correlations, and insights that can inform business strategy. They use statistical methods, machine learning algorithms, and data visualization tools to transform raw data into actionable intelligence.

typicalDay: Review business questions and define analysis scope
Build predictive models and machine learning algorithms
Create visualizations and dashboards for stakeholders
Present findings to executives and team members

subRoles.potential: High growth field with opportunities in every industry. Remote work possibilities and strong earning potential.

education.minimum: Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science or related field
education.preferred: Master's degree in Data Science or related field

subRoles.name: AI/ML Engineer
subRoles.shortDescription: Designs and implements artificial intelligence and machine learning systems.
subRoles.longDescription: AI/ML engineers develop and deploy machine learning models and artificial intelligence systems that can learn from data and make predictions or decisions. They work on everything from recommendation systems to autonomous vehicles.

subRoles.name: Research Scientist
subRoles.shortDescription: Conducts cutting-edge research to advance the field of artificial intelligence.
subRoles.longDescription: Research scientists work on pushing the boundaries of what's possible in AI and machine learning. They publish papers, develop new algorithms, and contribute to the academic and industrial advancement of the field.
